name: Italian Chicken and Cheese Casserole
description: Thanks to the cooked tomatoes in the marinara sauce, this recipe is a great source of lycopene, an anti-cancer pigment.
preparation: Combine breadcrumbs with Herb & Garlic Dip Mix and 3 Onion Dip Mix in a bag. Add chicken, shaking well to coat.
Heat oil in frying pan over medium-high heat. Brown chicken well on both sides.
Add Marinara Sauce. Cover with mozzarella and bake, uncovered, for 45 minutes.

products.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
summary: Classic notes of chives, onion & garlic.

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!

products.name: Marinara Sauce Mix
summary: A simple, kid-friendly sauce that speaks volumes, Marinara is packed with the bright flavor of garlic, oregano, and basil. Pair it with your fave pasta and use it as a base layer for delicious homemade pizza.
